title: RT + Probe Hybridization
pdfPath: Procedure/RT + Probe Hybridization/Molecular Loop 5 Target Seq Cheat Sheet .pdf

checklist.Text: Label PCR plate "Plate-###   ML Prep" (add tech initials and date)
Place ML Prep PCR Plate and broadcast Plate underneath camera view
Vortex and briefly spin down RT & Probe mix
Combine 172.8uL of RT Mix with 43.2ul of Probe Mix into labeled 1.5ml microcentrifuge tube
Place 1.5 mL tube of RT/Probe Mix in tube rack
Prepare liquidator tip box by removing tips corresponding to wells B12-H12
Load samples from Extract plate to ML Prep plate
Seal plate wells with BioRad 8-cap strips
